returns._0: The LTV ratio in basis points

params.ltvBasisPoints: The LTV ratio in basis points (max 7500 = 75%)
The new LTV ratio in basis points (max 7500 = 75%)

setOwner(address).details: Only callable by the current owner

MAX_LTV().notice: Maximum allowed LTV ratio (75% = 7500 basis points)

getLTV(address).notice: Returns the LTV ratio for an asset

getVault(address).notice: Returns the vault address for an asset

ltvRatios(address).notice: Mapping of asset to LTV ratio in basis points

registerVault(address,address,uint256).notice: Registers a new vault for an asset

setLTV(address,uint256).notice: Updates the LTV ratio for an asset

setOwner(address).notice: Transfers ownership to a new address

vaults(address).notice: Mapping of asset to vault address
